mapper.select: SELECT r.id , r.route_id , ro.name as route_name , ro.grade as routeGrade , ro.time_required , r.account_id , r.payment_id , s.number as seat_number , s.grade , r.status , r.created_at , r.updated_at FROM reservation r INNER JOIN route ro ON r.route_id = ro.id INNER JOIN seat s ON ro.id = s.route_id WHERE r.id = #{id} AND status != 'DELETE'

SELECT r.id , r.route_id , ro.name as route_name , ro.grade as routeGrade , ro.time_required , r.account_id , r.payment_id , s.number as seat_number , s.grade , r.status , r.created_at , r.updated_at FROM reservation r INNER JOIN route ro ON r.route_id = ro.id INNER JOIN seat s ON ro.id = s.route_id WHERE r.account_id = #{accountId} AND status != 'DELETE'
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO reservation (route_id, account_id, payment_id, status, created_at, updated_at) VALUES (#{routeId}, #{accountId}, #{paymentId}, #{status}, NOW(), NOW())
